    • Constructor Detail

      • Project

        public Project()
        New Instance. The setBasePath(File) defaults to current directory.

      • Project

        public Project(String pomPath)
        throws ProjectException
        New Instance loading Maven pom. The setBasePath(File) defaults to the pom's parent directory.
        Parameters:
        pomPath - String path
        Throws:
        ProjectException - exception
